title: Pesto Palmiers
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°. Line baking sheet with parchment paper. On a lightly floured surface, unfold puff pastry. Roll into a 10x12 inch rectangle. Spread pesto evenly over pastry, leaving 1/2 inch border. Sprinkle with parmesan. Starting from one short side, roll pastry tightly to the center. Roll the other side to meet in the middle. Refrigerate 30 minutes. Slice into 1/4 inch rounds. Place on prepared baking sheet 2 inches apart. Bake 12-15 minutes until golden brown.
